resources.string: Please provide the ip-address of your TV:
Shows current user query and program information:
Matching key(s) failed due to the following reason: %s
Entering key(s) failed due to the following reason: %s

Directions for use:

1. Activate google voice detection to be active on every screen.
2. Say: "Ok google" to initialize voice detection.
3. Say: "note to myself <action>" to execute voice command.

Please note, that VoiceTV App must be configured as the default App for note command handling.
